title: [Bug][BuildCheck] BuildCheck tests are broken in main
body:
Build Check tests `SampleAnalyzerIntegrationTest_ReplayBinaryLogOfAnalyzedBuild` and `SampleAnalyzerIntegrationTest_AnalyzeOnBuild` are broken by PR #10186. 

Most probable reason is filtering out the events needed for used env variable analyzer.

nodes.body: The event was added in the #10470
